question.qText: What is the message of the visual?

aBtn.aText: Everyone needs to eat a hearty breakfast every day.
Everyone should question their knowledge of what eating healthy actually means.
Food was much healthier and more substantial in the past than it is today.
Food only tastes good when someone else is paying for it.
Fast food restaurants have grown rapidly in the past decades, ruining Americansâ€™ health.
